sentences.en: Babbitt was without a canon which would enable him to speak with authority.
sentences.cn: 巴比特无章可循,不能作权威性的发言了.

sentences.en: Canon law was in decline in the tenth and early eleventh centuries.
sentences.cn: 寺院法在10世纪和11世纪初走向衰落.

sentences.en: Didn't you hear the canon going on at her this morning?
sentences.cn: 你听见牧师今天早上怒骂她 吗 ?

sentences.en: He had to read a canon of accepted literary texts.
sentences.cn: 他不得不阅读一系列公认的经典文学作品。

sentences.en: Here and there at long distances upon the canon sides rose the headframes of a mine.
sentences.cn: 峡谷两侧,一路过去,到处屹立着矿井井架.

sentences.en: Modern radical economics grew from Ricardo ( and the labor theory of value ) and found its canon on Marx.
sentences.cn: 现代激进经济学渊源于李嘉图 ( 与劳动价值论 ),并从马克思学说中获得武器.

sentences.en: One of its first tasks was to outline a fixed canon.
sentences.cn: 它的一种最初的急务就是编订一本确定的圣典.

sentences.en: Richard refused to trade in his old Canon cameras.
sentences.cn: 理查德拒绝用他的旧佳能相机以旧换新。

sentences.en: Sa: Oh , he did that with Diane Canon. Oh yeah, sure.
sentences.cn: 山: 哦, 他是对黛安·卡侬说. 对了, 一定是.

sentences.en: The Church's canon law forbids remarriage of divorced persons.
sentences.cn: 该教派教规禁止离婚者再婚。

sentences.en: The explanations ancient TIM classics was first given in Canon of Medicine.
sentences.cn: 中医经典中的训诂,最早的是在注释《内经》中出现的.

sentences.en: The very first canon of nursing is to keep the air inside as fresh as the air outside.
sentences.cn: 护理工作的首要原则是要保持室内空气像室外一样清新。

sentences.en: This is the latest released miniature digital camera by Canon.
sentences.cn: 这是佳能最新发布的小型数码相机.

sentences.en: We sell all kinds of audio connectors, like canon, jack and plug.
sentences.cn: 我们出售的各种音频接口, 像佳能, 杰克和堵塞.

trans.tran_cn: 标准，准则，教规，宗规，（在大教堂任职的）教士，（某作家的）真作，真经
trans.tran_en: an established law of the Christian church
